constraints: sandtconsist of any valid ascii character.
data.problem_statement:
Given two stringssandt,determine if they are isomorphic.

Two stringssandtare isomorphic if the characters inscan be replaced to gett.

All occurrences of a character must be replaced with another character while preserving the order of characters. No two characters may map to the same character, but a character may map to itself.
data.title: Isomorphic Strings
